summary: REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear implemented via new contents in frontend/public/robots.txt and frontend/public/sitemap.xml. REQ-3 (required SEO images under frontend/public/assets/generated with exact filenames) is not evidenced in the diff summary. Several additional SEO/deployment-related changes are mentioned that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the SEO images referenced by the app exist as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated using the exact filenames already referenced in the codebase.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows modifications to robots.txt and sitemap.xml but does not show the required image files being added/modified under frontend/public/assets/generated, nor any evidence that those exact .jpg assets now exist.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (does not list any additions under frontend/public/assets/generated)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated comprehensive SEO meta tags in frontend/index.html (title/description/keywords/Open Graph/Twitter/canonical).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for robots.txt, sitemap.xml, and ensuring two SEO image assets exist; it did not request adding/updating meta tags in index.html.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a React SEOHead component that injects JSON-LD structured data.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not request structured data/JSON-LD or new SEO components; scope was robots.txt, sitemap.xml, and static images.
Non-goals include external SEO services and the request is limited to indexing files and static assets; documentation for deployment was not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Substantial changes to application UI/components and prediction form (brands list, new fields, projections, admin dashboard, styling/theme changes, products content changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly scoped changes to SEO indexing assets (robots/sitemap) and ensuring two static images exist; broader feature/UI changes were not requested.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (entries for "frontend/src/components/PredictionForm.tsx", "frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.tsx", "frontend/src/components/Products.tsx", "frontend/src/index.css", "frontend/tailwind.config.js", and multiple other component summaries indicating functional/styling changes)
